definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Music score is the best material to reconstruct the pitches of ancient tones.
sentences.chinese: 曲谱是拟测古声调调值最好的语料。

definition: the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
entering tone/checked tone/one of the four tones of Middle Chinese
falling tone/fourth tone in modern Mandarin
consonant/the initial consonant (of a Chinese syllable)
(phonology) coda, the part of a syllable that follows its vocalic nucleus (e.g. "u" in kòu or "n" in běn)
pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
